There are no purchases to display
Schedule your expenses ahead of time!
This is the dashboard. You can see an overview of your recent purchases and spending trends here.
Use this to scan QR codes on your receipts to quickly add purchases to your history.
Plan your expenses in advance. When the date arrives, you\'ll receive a notification to confirm, and it will be automatically added to your purchase history.
Manage your profile settings and view your activity history here.
You can always change the time period or the category of purchases displayed from here.

Welcome to PurchaseHistory!\nThis is a project made by a solo developer in his free time, inspired by the Bulgarian QR code receipt system and by my will to see my monthly spending. Feel free to reach out for suggestions and issues on my email purchase.history.bg@gmail.com

By using this application, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined here.
The application is provided as-is, without any guarantees or warranties. The developer is not responsible for any data loss, damages, or any other issues that may arise from using the application.
You agree to use the application at your own risk and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
The developer reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice.

Your privacy is important to us. This application collects and stores your purchase history data on a secure server. No personal data is shared with third parties without your explicit consent.
You have full control over your data and can delete it at any time. For any questions or concerns, please contact the developer at:
purchase.history.bg@gmail.com.
By using this application, you consent to the collection and use of your data as described in this policy.
Would you like a quick tour to get familiar with the features and functionalities of the application?
A scheduled payment is due. Price: %.2f \nShould we add it to the purchases?
Displaying all purchases within a period, grouped by category and formed into a piechart
A line chart showing the sum of all purchases per day. Usefull to see patterns for each month
A stacked bar chart displaying the summed purchases for each day, separated by categories. Useful for detailed view of each day.
A list of the latest purchases

This is a list of the latest purchases, showing details such as date, time, price, and category. You can filter and sort the list to find specific purchases easily, making it convenient to track your spending habits.

This is a stacked bar chart displaying the summed purchases for each day, separated by categories. It provides a detailed view of each day\'s expenses, helping you to identify spending patterns and manage your budget more effectively.

This is a line chart showing the sum of all purchases per day. It is useful for seeing spending trends and patterns over a period, allowing you to manage your budget effectively and make informed financial decisions.

This is a pie chart displaying all purchases within a period, grouped by category. It helps you to understand the distribution of your expenses across different categories, providing insights into where your money is going.
Share a link with your financial consultant to view your statistics
Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is an inreversable action
Color should be a valid hex value (e.g., #FFFFFF)
Hex value should be 6 characters long
Notification permission is required to add scheduled expenses.
Something went wrong, please try again later

The app ran into an error, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We would be grateful if you could send us feedback to help us improve the application. Your input is valuable to us, and we appreciate your understanding and patience.\nThank you for your cooperation.
SSL Error. No address associated with server hostname
Most-used category in the last 30 days:

This chart shows the cumulative total of your spending over time, separated by months. It helps you track your spending habits, identify trends, and manage your budget more effectively. By visualizing your cumulative spending, you can see how close you are to reaching your financial limits and make informed decisions to stay within your budget.
Shows the cumulative total of all purchases over a period, separated by months.
Shows the monthly limit in some charts.
To hide the limit, set to -1
Provide feedback or report a problem
Please provide your feedback or report any issues you encountered.
Describe the issue you encountered or explain your idea…
